name: Safetica Free Encrypted Virtual Disk Archive
summary: Learn about .DCO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: DCO files can incorporate several different encryption ciphers including Blowfish, Twofish, CAST5, CAST6, MARS, RC5, RC6, Rijndael (AES), and Serpent ciphers.
NOTE: Safetica Free was previously called DisCryptor.

description: File created by Safetica Free, a program used for securely encrypting personal and business data; stores a virtual disk in an encrypted format and can be securely stored on external devices such as USB keys; similar to a .DCF file, which is used for encrypted file archives.
